story.text: As the clouds finally part, the sun reveals this mornings vibrant green of the rolling hills to be buried under the blood and body parts of the battlefield.
A fallen warrior lies face-down on the ground.
The fallen warrior stares blankly into the sky, an amulet on his chest glittering in the sunlight.
The fallen warrior that you have looted stares blankly into the sky, beyond accusation.
A well-trodden path stretches between dense trees under a dark canopy. In the distance, a villager gathers firewood.
The old woman interrupts her work and turns around to greet you, a tired smile on her face, but as soon as she sees the dead soldiers amulet on your chest, she breaks into tears.
The old woman interrupts her work and turns around, a tired smile on her face. "Hello, young man, what brings you this way?"

actable.text: I bring news from the battlefield.
